entry.title: ITEM NUMBER 022475 COOLER BAG 4 PIECES PER PACK
entry.summary:
Vendor: NOVELTY INC
Type: DRINKING ACCESSORIES
Price: 40.80

Neoprene Cooler Bag fits an entire 12-can-pack, or 6-bottle-pack. Plus it features extra storage in the front zipper pocket. This cooler bag will keep your drinks cold for hours and hours. Plus it converts into a backpack making it super convenient to carry with you. Perfect for camping, fishing, hiking, picnics, tailgating and more. Comes in a variety of styles.
